Upscale Cafe in Cicero

NOW SERVING Italian-American BREAKFAST AND bruncH, with a touch of Mexican flarE IN A SPA-LIKE AMBIANCE, CREATING a warm, relaxed and quiet dining experience.


Located in Cicero, bringing you gourmet cafe fare with neighborhood charm

Revive Club & Cafe opened in April 2015 in the heart of Cicero -- owners Dolores Monterroso and Guillermo Lopez had a vision to bring an upscale cafe and dining experience to the Cicero community. From relaxing instrumental music you hear when you walk in the door, the beautiful outdoor patio for al fresco dining, inventive and delicious gourmet sandwiches, coffee and desserts -- you are walking into a world of class and quality when you walk into Revive Club & Cafe.

Revive offers catering for parties and events of any size in addition to daily gourmet fare -- contact us for special catering promotions for your next event.
